contentfulPost.title: Podcast Episode 3: Home Services Marketing With Patrik Connole

description.description: Episode of three of the "Business Savvy" podcast is now live! Patrik Connole of Oozle Media joins the show to talk home services marketing trends.

contentfulPost.snippetTitle: Podcast Episode 3: Home Services Marketing With Patrik Connole
